host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser les équipements Juniper M Series en SNMP}
{EN: Template to check Juniper M Series using SNMP protocol}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Juniper M Series using SNMP protocol
host_templates.name: Net-Juniper-Mseries-SNMP

information.author: Centreon
information.changelog: * add filter options for bgp-peer-state service

description.value:
Plugin pack to monitor Juniper M-Series router via SNMP:
* Cpu-Routing
* Disk (by name, ID or global)
* Hardware
* Memory-Routing
* Traffic (by interface name, ID or all interfaces)
* Storage
* LDP sessions status
* LSP status
* RSVP session status
* BGP peer state
* BGP peer statistics

Plugin pack pour superviser un routeur Juniper M-Series via sNMP :
* Cpu-Routing
* Disk (by name, ID or global)
* Hardware
* Memory-Routing
* Traffic (by interface name, ID or all interfaces)
* Storage
* LDP sessions status
* LSP status
* RSVP session status
* BGP peer state
* BGP peer statistics

information.monitoring_procedure:
# Monitoring procedure ## Prerequisites ### Centreon Plugin Install this plugin on each needed poller: # yum install centreon-plugin-Network-Routers-Juniper-Mseries-Snmp Be sure to have with you the following information: * Read-Only SNMP community * IP Address of the equipment ### Configure SNMP on your server Follow constructor procedure for your equipment. ### SNMP Permissions Read-Only access. ### Troubleshooting Read [Troubleshooting SNMP](https://documentation.centreon.com/docs/centreon-plugins/en/latest/user/guide.html#snmp). ## Centreon Configuration ### Create a host using the appropriate template Go to *Configuration > Hosts* and click *Add*. Then, fill the form as shown by the following table:
Field Value

Host name

Name of the host

Alias

Host description

IP

Host IP Address

Monitored from

Monitoring Poller to use

Host Multiple Templates

Net-Juniper-Mseries-SNMP-custom
Click on the *Save* button.
information.name: Juniper M-Series

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle l'utilisation mémoire du 'Routing Engine'.}

{EN: Check Memory Usage of routing engine.}
service_templates.name: Net-Juniper-Mseries-Memory-Routing

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle l'état du matériel.}

{EN: Check hardware.}
service_templates.name: Net-Juniper-Mseries-Hardware

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle l'utilisation CPU du 'routing engine'.}

{EN: Check CPU Usage of routing engine.}
service_templates.name: Net-Juniper-Mseries-Cpu-Routing

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle du taux d'espace libre disponible du disque (via l'ID). Les seuils pourront être en pourcentage, en espace libre restant.}

{EN: Check the rate of free space on the disk (use the ID). Thresholds can be in percentage or in free space remaining.}
service_templates.name: Net-Juniper-Mseries-Disk-Generic-Id

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle du taux d'espace libre disponible du disque (via le nom. Difficile à utiliser). Les seuils pourront être en pourcentage, en espace libre restant.}

{EN: Check the rate of free space on the disk (use the Name. Difficult to use: prefer 'Id' or 'Global' to filter). Thresholds can be in percentage or in free space remaining.}
service_templates.name: Net-Juniper-Mseries-Disk-Generic-Name

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle du taux d'espace libre disponible du disque (via le nom. Difficile à utiliser). Les seuils pourront être en pourcentage, en espace libre restant.}

{EN: Check the rate of free space on the disk (use the Name. Difficult to use: prefer 'Id' or 'Global' to filter). Thresholds can be in percentage or in free space remaining.}
service_templates.name: Net-Juniper-Mseries-Disk-Global

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle de la bande passante de l'interface. Pour chaque contrôle apparaîtra le nom de l'interface (« label » raccourci décrivant l'interface).}

{EN: Check the bandwidth of the interface. For each checks the name of the interface will appear (« label » shortcut describing the interface).}
service_templates.name: Net-Juniper-Mseries-Traffic-Generic-Id

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle de la bande passante de l'interface. Pour chaque contrôle apparaîtra le nom de l'interface (« label » raccourci décrivant l'interface).}

service_templates.name: Net-Juniper-Mseries-Traffic-Generic-Name

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle de la bande passante d'un ensemble d'interfaces. Pour chaque contrôle apparaîtra le nom de l'interface (« label » raccourci décrivant l'interface).}

{EN: Check the bandwidth of  interfaces. For each checks the name of the interface will appear (« label » shortcut describing the interface).}
service_templates.name: Net-Juniper-Mseries-Traffic-Global
